I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

one_node_params: OneNodeParams orig_base_params
raft_params: RaftParams orig_base_params

Goal:

Record OneNodeParams (P : BaseParams) : Type := Build_OneNodeParams { init : data; handler : input -> data -> output * data } Arguments Build_OneNodeParams _ _ _%function_scope
deghost = fun (base_params : BaseParams) (multi_params : MultiParams base_params) (ghost_params : GhostMultiParams multi_params) (net : network) => {| nwPackets := map deghost_packet (nwPackets net); nwState := fun X : Net.name => match net with | {| nwState := nwState |} => let H := X in let nwState0 := nwState H in let (_, d) := nwState0 in d end |} : forall (base_params : BaseParams) (multi_params : MultiParams base_params) (ghost_params : GhostMultiParams multi_params), network -> network Arguments deghost {base_params multi_params ghost_params}

refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply' = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : Net.name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (d : raft_data) (t : nat) (v : bool), handleRequestVoteReply (pDst p) (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) (pSrc p) t v = d -> gd = update_elections_data_requestVoteReply (pDst p) (pSrc p) t v (nwState net (pDst p)) -> pBody p = RequestVoteReply t v -> P net -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply' {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
RRIR_handleMessage : forall (p : packet) (net : network) (xs ys : list packet) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : electionsData) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net -> handleMessage (pSrc p) (pDst p) (pBody p) (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) = (d, l) -> update_elections_data_net (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = gd -> nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> (forall h : name, st' h = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) (gd, d) h) ->...-> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}
refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply' = fun (orig_base_params : BaseParams) (one_node_params : OneNodeParams orig_base_params) (raft_params : RaftParams orig_base_params) (P : network -> Prop) => forall (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : Net.name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (gd : ghost_data) (d : raft_data) (m : list (name * msg)) (t : nat) (es : list entry) (res : bool), handleAppendEntriesReply (pDst p) (snd (nwState net (pDst p))) (pSrc p) t es res = (d, m) -> gd = fst (nwState net (pDst p)) -> pBody p = AppendEntriesReply t es res -> P net -> refined_raft_intermediate_reachable net ->...-> Prop Arguments refined_raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply' {orig_base_params one_node_params raft_params} _%function_scope
raft_invariant_handle_message : forall (P : network -> Prop) (xs : list packet) (p : packet) (ys : list packet) (net : network) (st' : name -> data) (ps' : list packet) (d : raft_data) (l : list (name * msg)), raft_net_invariant_append_entries P -> raft_net_invariant_append_entries_reply P -> raft_net_invariant_request_vote P -> raft_net_invariant_request_vote_reply P -> handleMessage (pSrc p) (pDst p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (d, l) -> P net -> raft_intermediate_reachable net -> nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> (forall h : name, st' h = update name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d h) ->...-> P {| nwPackets := ps'; nwState := st' |}

StepFailure_deliver : forall (net net' : network) (failed : list Net.name) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> ~ In (pDst p) failed -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update Net.name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> step_failure (failed, net) (failed, net') [(pDst p, inr out)]
step_dup_sind : forall P : network -> network -> list (Net.name * (input + list output)) -> SProp, (forall (net net' : network) (p : packet) (xs ys : list packet) (out : list output) (d : data) (l : list (Net.name * Net.msg)), nwPackets net = xs ++ p :: ys -> net_handlers (pDst p) (pSrc p) (pBody p) (nwState net (pDst p)) = (out, d, l) -> net' = {| nwPackets := send_packets (pDst p) l ++ xs ++ ys; nwState := update Net.name_eq_dec (nwState net) (pDst p) d |} -> P net net' [(pDst p, inr out)]) ->...-> P n n0 l

```coq
intros net p H.
unfold deghost.
simpl.
rewrite map_map.
simpl.
apply in_map with (f:=deghost_packet) in H.
exact H.
Qed.
